law.text: The commissioner shall, if requested by any interested party served with notice as required herein, make a complete record of any testimony, evidence, and proceedings at any hearing conducted pursuant to this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1480, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 9, effective June 16, 1972.
